ygData.msgSnippet: A screech echoed through the desert sky as a haunting form flew about. A dragon, scaled to the jaw, armored on every inch of his scaled body. Megaton flew

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

A screech echoed through the desert sky as a haunting form flew about. A
dragon, scaled to the jaw, armored on every inch of his scaled body. Megaton
flew sharply through the sky like a living mountain. Bringing dust and
disaster in his wake he rushed toward his destiny.

The great beast came to a cloudy stop as his enormous spiked wings raised
the sand around him. He was the creature that made the Earth tremble as he
aproached. He tipped his head to the ground, smiling his cunning tyranical
grin that obviously came from Megatrons influence. He sniffed the ground
finding a familiar scent. He smelled his donor. The bot was through the area
not to long ago. The dragon was intrigued so he decided to follow the trail.
